title: Figment (2017) [RePack]
description:
Year of manufacture: 2017
Genre: Action, Adventure, Indie
Developer: Bedtime Digital Games
Publisher: Bedtime Digital Games
Publication Type: RePack
Platform: PC
Language: Russian, English, MULTi16
Language of voice: English
Medicine: not required

System requirements:
☑ OS: Windows 7/8/10
☑ Processor: Intel Core i5 4670T @ 2.3 GHz, AMD FX 8370E @ 3.3 GHz
☑ RAM: 8 GB of RAM
☑ Video card: Nvidia Geforce GTX 480, Nvidia GeForce GTX 580M, AMD Radeon R7-265 or equivalent
☑ Disk space: 8 GB

Description:
A musical game that unfolds in the secret corners of the human consciousness ... Welcome to the world of Figment. Strange surreal world; a place filled with our secret thoughts, desires and memories, populated by the multitude of voices that we hear in our heads. For many years this mind has been quiet and calm. But now something has changed. Here, new thoughts began to emerge, which took the form of terrible creatures, spreading fear everywhere. Now the grouchy Dusty - the former voice of courage - is the only hope of this mind. It depends on it, whether the mind will come into itself and whether it will meet its fears face to face. Dusty and his cheerful girlfriend Piper together embark on a journey through reason: join them in this incredible adventure, solve puzzles to fix everything, fight with nightmares and search for lost courage
